title: Breath
description: A Mage’s List for 1.    Escape his evil, controlling clan.2.    Get a job. 3.    Work magic on HIS terms.4.    Avoid all dragons.Tori was doing great until sexy dragon Baldewin interfered.Between the little gifts, constant protection, and the steadfast confidence from the overgrown lizard, Tori wonders if maybe that last step needs revising. He has no chance to consider it. Not before trouble called Jaeggi REALLY hits. Now he’s on the road trip from hell to the one place he’d never thought would be a safe haven. A clan of dragons. Assuming they make it, that is.
author: A.J. Sherwood
